HomePage.title: Rafał Maculewicz
HomePage.role: End-to-End System Engineer | Microsoft Analytics Expert | Scrum Master
HomePage.slogan: Data that speaks the language of your business.
HomePage.aboutText1: I am a specialist who builds bridges between complex technology and real business needs. My career path is a unique blend of the IT world and management – before fully dedicating myself to data analytics, I gained extensive experience as a Marketing Manager at the international corporation, Bostik.
HomePage.aboutText2: This background ensures that when I build Power BI dashboards or design Azure architecture, I don’t just think about the code. I think about how that data will impact your margins, sales efficiency, and decision-making speed. I help companies stop "guessing" and start acting based on facts.
HomePage.projectsHeading: How can I help your company?
HomePage.contactText: You have the data, but do you have the insights? Let’s talk about how I can help your business grow.
HomePage.name: Name

ev_assist.title: EV Assist
ev_assist.description: A PWA application for calculating electric vehicle charging needs based on current battery level and distance to destination.

fairpact.title: FairPact
fairpact.description: A web application designed to analyze contracts and identify prohibited clauses using OCR and NLP.
